analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sekkham dhammam paccayā hetu sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na asekkham dhammam paccayā hetu asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na hetum na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho
analyzed: hetu paccayā na na hetum na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
